Collection

The collection is a container that acts similar to an array, which allows you to perform several extra functions like searching and deleting records within the collection through a variety of means.

The collection stores its contents in an array named “items”.

The collection class is used by the Animation class, when rendering an AnimationSequence.

Summary
Collection
The collection is a container that acts similar to an array, which allows you to perform several extra functions like searching and deleting records within the collection through a variety of means.
Functions
Collection
Initializes the Object
create
Adds a new item to the list of items in the collection.
find
Find a specific item using its index
find_and_delete_by_id
Find and delete specific item using its index.

Functions

Collection

Collection = function()

Initializes the Object

create

Collection.prototype.create = function(item)

Adds a new item to the list of items in the collection.

Parameters

itemA javascript object.  If the object has a type attribute then it will be used otherwise it will be given the type “message”.

find

Collection.prototype.find = function(index)

Find a specific item using its index

Parameter

indexInteger of a particular collection item within the items array.

find_and_delete_by_id

Collection.prototype.find_and_delete_by_id = function(id)

Find and delete specific item using its index.

Parameter

indexInteger of a particular collection item within the items array.
